name: SmartPay for WooCommerce
author: SmartPay

sections.description:
WC-SmartPay is a WordPress plugin designed to integrate SmartPay.co.il payment gateway with WooCommerce. Now, users of SmartPay.co.il can securely process transactions on their WooCommerce-based online stores.

Features

  • Easy Integration: Quickly connect your WooCommerce store to SmartPay.co.il.
  • Secure Transactions: Ensure the safety of transactions with the reliable SmartPay.co.il payment gateway.
  • Customizable Options: Tailor the payment experience to suit your needs.

Configuration

  1. Navigate to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments.
  2. Enable the “SmartPay” payment method.
  3. Enter your SmartPay.co.il API credentials.
  4. Customize additional settings as needed.

Support

For any issues or inquiries, please contact our support team via smartpay.

Contributors

A big thanks to the following contributors who have helped make WC-SmartPay possible:
– StarNetwork
– SmartPay.co.il

License

This plugin is licensed under the GNU General Public License v3.0.

External service domains

The plugin sends API requests to the following domains depending on operation mdoe selected (production or sandobx):
– https://app11.smartpay.co.il/
– https://api.protected-payment.com/
sections.installation:
1. Upload the wc-smartpay folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to WooCommerce > Settings > Payments, and enable “SmartPay” as a payment method.
  4. Configure your SmartPay.co.il API credentials in the plugin settings.
sections.faq:
Q: How do I obtain SmartPay.co.il API credentials?

A: You can obtain your API credentials by contacting SmartPay.co.il support.

Q: Is this plugin compatible with the latest version of WooCommerce?

A: Yes, this plugin is regularly updated to ensure compatibility with the latest WooCommerce releases.
